name: Laser Ball Arena
description:
Inspired by Arcades of the 80's, influenced by Rocket league and Tron. Point of the game - have fun and, if possible, cure depression.

Drive, jump and fire. Kick the ball into your own color goal. Don't let them do the same.

Player 1: Standard WASD/Cursor/controller to move, Space to jump, Ctrl/LMB to fire

Player 2: Controller

Features:

  • Split screen multiplayer
  • Online Multiplayer 

Upcoming features:

  • Laser fight game mode
  • Race game mode
  • Dynamic music track

Feel free to download and play early prototype demo.
